title: Cassiopeia's champion page outdated?

embed.description: Cassiopeia is a terrifying creature - half woman, half snake - whose slightest glance brings death. The youngest daughter of one of Noxus' most influential families, she was once a beautiful and cunning temptress capable of manipulating the hardest heart.

body:
She still has like her first champion spotlight video, like with her first splash art and all. Shouldn't this be fixed since it gives bad information to new players about how the game is and how it looks like?
Plus, I think the new extra lore that was made to Cassiopeia not long ago, I think it was called "Shedding of Skin" (which was badass af, good job lore team), should be added to her info page.
Just a little feedback.

replies.body:
The thing is that she never received another champion spotlight.

This isn't exactly uncommon for champions who receive a rework,that isn't a full VGU.
